title: is it cheating?

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
For anyone who is able to check this game that i linked pls tell me what the heck happened??
I played aram solo q and my team decided to almost not play at all. I felt like beeing the only human. My thought through the game were confusing. I thought they may be premades and trolling, but then i checked their items and they just bought items until they couldnt and they didnt upgrade or sell any of them just until it was full. That was when i thought "hey, maybe its a program which allows multiple account to run on a device and do random stuff as like bots do." It was just not rational or it didnt make any sense. Pls Let this get checked asap. I dont want to play a game where people are cheating in any way. And im totally sorry for my grammar as for my mistakes. Im dumb as hell. Have a nice Monday.

replies.body:
DREQQ -- 

Thanks for taking the time to write up a post about this. I'm going to take a look now and see what else I can find regarding the behavior. As a few others have pointed out, it is a bit difficult to tell the difference between actual bots and players that are new to the game. Luckily, there are a few other things we can check to be sure. 

Thanks again!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Cluvie,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Esgy3sUV,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-05-09T17:24:05.345+0000)
>
> DREQQ -- 
> 
> Thanks for taking the time to write up a post about this. I'm going to take a look now and see what else I can find regarding the behavior. As a few others have pointed out, it is a bit difficult to tell the difference between actual bots and players that are new to the game. Luckily, there are a few other things we can check to be sure. 
> 
> Thanks again!

Let me make this easier for you.

Let's play spot the botter -

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2180606852/233258118?tab=overview

That {{champion:28}}  needs to have a competent human look at it's account history and ban it.

I'm working on getting a new video card so I can start recording trolls and bots in game. Keep an eye out for that zSkeletoRz fellow. He is relentless.

PS - FYI Trundle was a bot to. One of the public bots though. Setup better, still trash though. A factory bot maybe. Eve however was a system I'm not familiar with seeing in game. It's something simple someone setup on their own. They use that account to play normals when not botting exp/ip.
Eve is the player that created this topic, so not a bot...

> [{quoted}](name=Luso Clemens,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Esgy3sUV,comment-id=000500010000,timestamp=2016-05-16T09:03:15.464+0000)
>
> Eve is the player that created this topic, so not a bot...

The Eve I was referring to can be found in the match history I posted, in the post you replied to.

It is now presumed banned as it has stopped being active, after a red looked at this post.

Please try to keep up with conversation.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Cluvie,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Esgy3sUV,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-05-09T17:24:05.345+0000)
>
> DREQQ -- 
> 
> Thanks for taking the time to write up a post about this. I'm going to take a look now and see what else I can find regarding the behavior. As a few others have pointed out, it is a bit difficult to tell the difference between actual bots and players that are new to the game. Luckily, there are a few other things we can check to be sure. 
> 
> Thanks again!

Weird. I reported a bot setup to AA Gromp, die and repeat in bot matches. Sent a ticket to support. You can tell this is happening just by looking at the match history. My ticket was closed and the botting account is still  botting away...

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/3UTdhf58-people-using-scripts-to-level-up-accounts

I'm personally keeping tabs on the account as it levels up using a botting script/program/app whatever you choose to call it. It was level 20 when I was in a game with it, reported it, sent a ticket to support after the match. The account is now level 24 and playing normals when not being botted. 

PS - Please explain to me how you guys have such a hard time picking out automated systems which follow the same algorithms, from human beings which don't tend to repeat the same consistent pattern over and over, thousands upon thousands  of consecutive times. Especially when there are 3 or 4 of the bots/scripts running in the same games, following  the same algorithms? I can pick a "botter" out just by watching the same patterns be repeated. Yes some are better put together. Running to and auto attacking Gromp, die and repeat until game ends. This is an obvious pattern...
Looks like a good portion of them were possible bots. Heal+Ghost combo almost usually means bots in aram/tt and previously dominion.
Nah , its low lvl, looks like new players. Trolling is almost impossible to differentiate from being new on low lvls.
If it is possible to watch the whole match you would understand what i mean.
I... I can't grammar anymore tonight....
There are bots in aram mode its kinda annoying
It just didnt feel like real trolling.
This happened more than twice in ARAM games for myself.  It's why I don't play ARAM anymore.  I reported every time it happened, but like I said, it keeps happening.
Once your ARAM mmr goes up this problem disappears. I play a fair amount of ARAM and I haven't seen a bot in over a year.
upvotes for calling yourself dumb as hell. I'm not suggesting that you are, I legitimately thought it was funny. Now I have to go clean tomato soup off my shirt -_-
